The Shelby Baer Plus Pro rear brakes are perfect for both street and casual racing applications. For optimum stopping performance
column3: our brakes feature a 6-piston calipers with staggered bore sizes
column4:
which minimize brake pad taper. The 6-pistons are made from stainless steel to reduce thermal transfer from the caliper and brake pads into the brake fluid.

The most important piece to this brake package
column5: however
column6: lies within the caliper construction itself. Its 6.5lb.
column7: 2-piece construction employs 6-crossbolts to maximize caliper stiffness and rigidity. This equates into a caliper that maintains its shape under severe braking conditions. Further
column8: the caliper and brake rotor interface better to provide the highest force possible while delivering the best _x0093_feedback_x0094_ to the driver under the widest possible braking conditions. Finally
column9:
the caliper uses an external crossover tube or outside bleeder.

The Shelby Plus Pro system features 14"
column10: curved vane directional 2-piece rotors.

column7: 77);">
column9:
77);">


Shelby High Performance Clutches are manufactured by Ace Racing Clutches in Sullivan
column10: Missouri. They are the last true American clutch manufacturer. These clutches are engineered
column11: machined
column13:
and tested under the same roof at Ace to insure quality and performance.

Light-Weight Construction

Shelby High Performance Clutches are made from light-weight forged aluminum. The cover is forged from 7075-T6 aluminum and the flywheel is forged from 6065-T6 aluminum. Weighing as little as 35 pounds
column14: compared to the 50+ pounds of a stock clutch
column15: these clutches unlock potential horsepower that heavy
column16: stamped steel clutches consume. This light weight construction also allows for faster revs
column18:
and easier rev matching on down shifts.

Sprung Hub Discs

Most performance clutches use a rigid center hub because they are limited on space with a stamped steel design. Shelby High Performance Clutches were engineered with drivability and longevity in mind. They are designed with sprung hub disc centers to reduce gear rattle
column20:
and increase the life of your transmission compared to rigid center hubs.

Proprietary Friction Material

Ace houses its own friction materials department too
column21:
where they develop specific blends to maximize drivability and torque holding capacity. No other clutch domestic clutch company makes their own friction materials. This allows Ace to fine tune the friction to each clutch line and its intended use. Ace tests their friction on their in-house dyno to ensure performance.

Patented Centrifugal-Assist Levers
column22: "sans-serif";"> Shelby High Performance Clutches contain Ace_x0092_s patented Centrifugal-Assist lever technology. This technology was born from Ace_x0092_s 6.25_x0094_ NHRA Pro Stock clutch. This technology allows each clutch to have more torque holding capacity without increasing the driver_x0092_s pedal effort. Ace has tuned this line of High Performance Shelby Clutches to have 15% more torque holding capacity at peak torque RPM. How it works is pure physics! Illustrated in the image below
column23:
as the engine RPM increases the levers are forced outward. The lever pivots and applies direct pressure to the pressure plate.

How POWERFORCE Technology Works!

These clutches use centrifugal force to increase plate load as the engine increases RPM. As the engine speeds up
column24: the patented lever assist technology pushes down on the pressure plate increasing the torque capacity by 15% or more. As the engine spins
column25:
forces are exerted outward: the same way spinning in a circle causes a person's arms to rise from their side. The levers experience the same force and the outer edge of the lever pulls away from the clutch as the engine RPM increases.
This puts a more efficient and positive load on the pressure plate
column26: unlike other systems that place weights on the diaphragms that will deflect. The patented lever assist technology
column27:
combined with Ace's superior friction materials makes it a logical choice for any Shelby or Mustang owner.



^

Shelby High Performance Clutches are manufactured by Ace Racing Clutches in Sullivan
column10: Missouri. They are the last true American clutch manufacturer. These clutches are engineered
column11: machined
column13:
and tested under the same roof at Ace to insure quality and performance.

Light-Weight Construction

Shelby High Performance Clutches are made from light-weight forged aluminum. The cover is forged from 7075-T6 aluminum and the flywheel is forged from 6065-T6 aluminum. Weighing as little as 35 pounds
column14: compared to the 50+ pounds of a stock clutch
column15: these clutches unlock potential horsepower that heavy
column16: stamped steel clutches consume. This light weight construction also allows for faster revs
column18:
and easier rev matching on down shifts.

Sprung Hub Discs

Most performance clutches use a rigid center hub because they are limited on space with a stamped steel design. Shelby High Performance Clutches were engineered with drivability and longevity in mind. They are designed with sprung hub disc centers to reduce gear rattle
column20:
and increase the life of your transmission compared to rigid center hubs.

Proprietary Friction Material

Ace houses its own friction materials department too
column21:
where they develop specific blends to maximize drivability and torque holding capacity. No other clutch domestic clutch company makes their own friction materials. This allows Ace to fine tune the friction to each clutch line and its intended use. Ace tests their friction on their in-house dyno to ensure performance.

Patented Centrifugal-Assist Levers
column22: "sans-serif";"> Shelby High Performance Clutches contain Ace_x0092_s patented Centrifugal-Assist lever technology. This technology was born from Ace_x0092_s 6.25_x0094_ NHRA Pro Stock clutch. This technology allows each clutch to have more torque holding capacity without increasing the driver_x0092_s pedal effort. Ace has tuned this line of High Performance Shelby Clutches to have 15% more torque holding capacity at peak torque RPM. How it works is pure physics! Illustrated in the image below
column23:
as the engine RPM increases the levers are forced outward. The lever pivots and applies direct pressure to the pressure plate.

How POWERFORCE Technology Works!

These clutches use centrifugal force to increase plate load as the engine increases RPM. As the engine speeds up
column24: the patented lever assist technology pushes down on the pressure plate increasing the torque capacity by 15% or more. As the engine spins
column25:
forces are exerted outward: the same way spinning in a circle causes a person's arms to rise from their side. The levers experience the same force and the outer edge of the lever pulls away from the clutch as the engine RPM increases.
This puts a more efficient and positive load on the pressure plate
column26: unlike other systems that place weights on the diaphragms that will deflect. The patented lever assist technology
column27:
combined with Ace's superior friction materials makes it a logical choice for any Shelby or Mustang owner.



^

column1: 38@^http://www.shelbystore.com/product-p/CR-GT5-FCPR002A.htm^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/product-p/CR-GT5-FCPR002A.htm^@^Shelby 1000 Competition Heat Exchanger (2013-2014)^@^Cooling^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/CR-GT5-FCPR002A-2.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/CR-GT5-FCPR002A-2.jpg^@^Shelby 1000 Competition Heat Exchanger (2013-2014)^@@@^CR-GT5-FCPR002A^@1199.99@$1
column2:
199.99@^ Applications:
  • Shelby 1000 (2013-2014)
Availability: Usually ships in 2 to 4 weeks

When the Hot-Rodders here at Shelby American started building high horsepower GT1000s
column3: they knew they needed to get the best cooling package they could get their hands on. So in cooperation with C & R
column4:
they designed a much larger heat exchanger to handle the extra heat that the 5.4L was going to be building up with upwards of 1000 horsepower on tap. This new heat exchanger features 11" fans to pull even more air across the core than the Extreme Duty Heat Exchanger.

Designed by Shelby and C/R
column5: our competition heat exchanger uses a proprietary NASCAR core
column6:
which features a single row core with a dual pass system.

The intercooler and heat exchanger build higher temperatures in normal
column7: spirited or on track driving conditions. With a stock Shelby or Mustang
column8:
the car has an on board computer program begins to curb spark and timing at 100 degrees. 100 degrees within the intercooler and heat exchanger can be achieved within minutes of starting the vehicle. After market tuners change this parameter to begin the timing and spark curb trend at 130 degrees to 140 degrees. Almost all supercharged vehicle owners can comprehend the power difference in their car when they first start it and drive versus 20 minutes later when the car just doesn_x0092_t seem to run as well or willing to "Spin the tires" This is what is called "Heat Soak."

Installation:
Click here for help on installing this product.^

column8: our extreme duty heat exchanger uses a proprietary NASCAR core
column9:

The intercooler and heat exchanger build higher temperatures in normal
column10: spirited or on track driving conditions. With a stock Shelby or Mustang
column11:
the car has an on board computer program begins to curb spark and timing at 100 degrees. 100 degrees within the intercooler and heat exchanger can be achieved within minutes of starting the vehicle. After market tuners change this parameter to begin the timing and spark curb trend at 130 degrees to 140 degrees. Almost all supercharged vehicle owners can comprehend the power difference in their car when they first start it and drive versus 20 minutes later when the car just doesn_x0092_t seem to run as well or is less willing to "spin the tires" This is what is called "heat soak."

Technical: There are two puller fans each pulling 709 CFM. That 1
column12:
418 CFM of air flow across the core of the heat exchanger which pulls the heat out of the fluid in the intercooler and heat exchanger.

If you want the most advanced
column5: most powerful
column6: most upgradeable and highest quality system available
column7:
then here it is!

Whipple Superchargers has yet again set a new precedence for bolt-on power and industry leading durability. Nobody puts more time and resources into the development then Whipple. The proof is in the product
column8: more power per lb of boost than any other system. The key to making such incredible reliable power is in the Whipple unique twin screw supercharger
column9: massive air-to-water intercooler
column10: oversized Crusher air system and innovative PCM programming that keeps the power-train safe and secure. Whether you're looking for a daily driver that needs a little more punch or you're craving a tire-frying
column11: rubber shredding street machine
column12: the Whipple Supercharger systems delivers like no other SC system today. Power from tip in to redline
column13:
the new Whipple SC system makes incredible power across the entire rpm range while maintaining industry leading drive-ability.

With years of OEM and racing experience
column14: Whipple engineers have developed a unique PCM calibration that reconfigures all the necessary engine functions including fuel
column15: spark
column18: transmission control and electronic throttle control. The vehicle's PCM constantly monitors the engine's torque output while monitoring many different parameters to keep the engine in it's ideal parameters. If a parameter falls below specification
column19: the PCM will lower boost and torque output until the problem can be cured. No other calibration in the field has such technology
column20:
giving the Whipple SC system unheralded performance and reliability.

Exclusive Features:
  • No other upgrades required
column21:
just massive power right out of the box.
  • Front entry W175ax (2.9 Liters) Whipple twin-screw supercharger that significantly outperforms competitions 1.9L and 2.3L roots-type systems.
  • 2.9L 26% larger than 2.3L roots0type
  • Front feed supercharger utilizes precision ground helical cut gears vs a problematic belt.
  • Oversized Crusher inlet for maximum airflow capacity and minimal rotor cavitation.
  • Front feed allows for oversized intercooler core compared to other small smaller intercooler cores giving Whipple lower air charge temps which allows more boost and timing to be run on pump gas.
  • Massive air-to-water aluminum bar-plate intercooler offers more cooling than any other positive displacement system available. Nothing Comes Close!
  • Massive oversized aluminum intercooler reservoir (over 2 gallons) holds more than double any competitor's IC water system allowing longer more consistent power.
  • Whipple Superchargers massive oversized intercooled air-bypass system for industry leading reduction of burst knock and incredible fuel economy.
  • Self-contained oversized oil system for dramatically reduced oil temps in even the most demanding conditions.
  • Exclusive 3x5 rotor combo for significant increase in airflow under the curve than less efficient 4x6 rotor combo or 4x4 roots.
  • Center discharge port for better cylinder to cylinder distribution than other twin-screws with cobbled together billet adapters and forward facing discharge.
  • W175ax SC bottom is open for increased plenum volume and better over-intercooler air distribution giving more intercooler effectiveness.
  • Extra Plenum Volume below intercooler cor far less pressure drop.
  • Discharge down design allows for less pressure loss which gives more power at lower boost levels.
  • Top mount design allows for cooler operation than upside down SC's that conduct heat from engine and are trapped by runners and covers
column22:
causing hotter manifold temps and less power per pound of boost.
  • More boost at the "Hit" than any other twin-screw.
  • Flat torque curve for incredible acceleration.
  • Oversized heat exchanger for incredible intercooler water temps.
column24:
77);">Fits under factory hood with no modifications.
  • No internal modifications required.
  • Completed installations looks factory installed
column25: not some cobbled together kit with multiple billet adapters.

77);">Kits come complete with all necessary parts and hardware for installation.

column28:
no dipstick to bind or misread.
  • Plug and play wiring with male and female connections.
  • Proven 6-rib belt system with matching billet pulleys.
  • Stainless steel tapered jack-shaft with unique plastic cover (or optional carbon fiber) for increased safety.
  • Optional 10-rib belt system with matching billet pulleys.
  • OEM quick connect fittings for easy installation
column29:
no ugly brass or steel fittings on the SC.
  • Complete kits and tuner kits are available.
  • Available in wrinkle black

Ford textured Blue or any custom color.
  • Easily upgradable with big cold air intakes and bigger throttle bodies (98mm round or 140mm elliptical.
  • Instant boost at the touch of the throttle.
  • 3 Minute pulley changes.
  • Lightweight pocketed SC pulley.
    • Front Inlet vs. Rear Inlet.
    The Whipple front feed system is far superior to other
column32: smaller supercharger rear inlet based SC systems for a very simple reason
column33: less inlet restrictions. The fact is simple
column34: the front entry systems do not require multiple 90deg bends or one sweeping 180deg bend before the SC inlet
column35: which causes unequal rotor filling and lower volumetric efficiency. The new Whipple system only has 1 gradual bend
column36:
less then half that of the rear entry style systems.

Rear inlet systems also sacrifice the rear inlet to clear the firewall in most cases
column37: or there's a big need to slide the SC too far forward
column38: making the discharge pointed up and away from the intercooler core
column39: making the air have to make another turn just to get to the intercooler core. It's simple
column40: the more work the air has to do
column41:
the lower the power gains are going to be.

Whipple Fuel System
The Whipple front feed system uses the stock GT500 dual spray pattern
column42:
Bosch mid-length 58lb/hr fuel injectors and billet high flow fuel rails to supply plenty of fuel for all the power desired. Each Whipple system comes with proper emissions compatable fuel line with OEM quick connect fittings for simple installation.

The Whipple Advantage
The Whipple Advantage is designed into every Whipple SC system. This advantage is broken down into 5 categories during the design and testing phases which truly sets Whipple apart from others:
  1. Best power for money.
  2. Most complete package.
  3. Maximum power.
  4. Maximum power expandability.
  5. Aesthetic appeal.
What does this mean? You get it all
column43: in one package. Massive power gaines with the biggest superchargers
column46: biggest air-inlet systems while providing robust belt systems and heavy-duty spring tensioners. The intake manifold is designed with high velocity in mind
column47:
while increasing plenum volume in lower pressure loss at high power applications.

You then get OEM style fuel and vacuum hoses with nylon sheaving for added protection and appeal
column48: OEM style quick connect fittings with billet aluminum fittings. No ugly brass fittings hanging off the inlet like some others. Wire extensions are injection molded to allow simple plug-and-play installations. Each system also has multiple options for increased performance such as oversized heat exchangers with dual fans
column50:
oversized cold air intake systems just to name a few.

Each kit comes with step-by-step instruction manuals printed in color to help all installers
column51: including the do-it-yourselfer. Kits come with all the fasteners
column52:
all color matched for proper aesthetic appeal.

So don't be fooled by others
column53: there is no comparing to the Whipple supercharger system
column54:
simply the top of the line packages designed and built to exceed all expectations.

Whipple's Superior Engineering
Leaving no stone unturned
column55: Whipple's revolutionary system for the Ford 5.0L Coyote engines is truly resetting the standards of supercharging. With it's massive front feed inlet
column56: typical inlet inefficiencies are a thing of the past. With the lightweight
column58:
the supercharger pulley height is offset .75" below the supercharger centerline. Why? Whipple engineers were able to add .50" thicker intercooler core and .25" more plenum volume below the core to decrease temps and pumping losses.

Other positive displacement superchargers sacrificed plenum volume and runner size while Whipple's engineer's used every square inch available to open the volume of the manifold
column59: allowing for future expansion of power levels. Small runner and small volume manifolds cause excess boost "build-up" giving you manifold pressure
column60: not proper cylinder pressure. This results in high boost
column61:
low power scenario's with excess heat from the lack of proper flowing air volume.

Whipple didn't just stop there
column62: knowing that the coyote motors love boost
column63: Whipple's teamed squeezed an epically large oversized aluminum bar and plater intercooler core into it's large intake manifold
column64: nearly 30% larger than the competition! With more open surface area
column65: both on top of the core and the core itself
column66:
Whipple's post intercooler air temps are second to none. Cooler air equals denser air which equals more power at each boost level while being safer in engine components.

The bigger intercooler alone wasn't enough
column68: the supercharger discharge was typically too far forward from the intercooler core
column69: and sandwiched so close to the core on top that the core's surface area was not properly utilized. With the front feed 2.9L compressor
column70: Whipple was able to increase the volume and distance above the intercooler core
column71: as well as being the same below. That issue
column74: but not at the valves and combustion chamber. This means high boost
column75: low power and high discharge temps. Whipple's front feed system has a rear discharge port at nearly the center of the IC core. Through countless CFD analysis
column76: Whipple's design utilizes nearly the entire intercooler core
column77:
resulting in less pressure drop and cooler temps for increased power levels.

Another great feature to the Whipple Coyote kits is the oversized heat exchanger
column78: oversized aluminum intercooler reservoir and optional dual fan kit. The oversized heat exchanger is nearly the size of the engine radiator
column79: giving incredible cooling capacity for daily driving
column80: drag racing or road racing. Get the dual Spal fan kit option and increase the airflow over the heat exchanger. The Whipple oversized aluminum reservoir is again a unique feature included with every kit. The aluminum reservoir is remote mounted in the driver side inner fender
column81: keeping it in a cool area away from engine heat
column82: along with having over 1.2 gallons of capacity in the reservoir alone! Giving the intercooler system well over 2 gallons of capacity. This means cooler air temps
column83: less heat soak and more power.

Designed by Shelby and C/R
column8: our extreme duty heat exchanger uses a proprietary NASCAR core
column9:
which features a single row core with a dual pass system.

The intercooler and heat exchanger build higher temperatures in normal
column10: spirited or on track driving conditions. With a stock Shelby or Mustang
column11:
the car has an on board computer program begins to curb spark and timing at 100 degrees. 100 degrees within the intercooler and heat exchanger can be achieved within minutes of starting the vehicle. After market tuners change this parameter to begin the timing and spark curb trend at 130 degrees to 140 degrees. Almost all supercharged vehicle owners can comprehend the power difference in their car when they first start it and drive versus 20 minutes later when the car just doesn_x0092_t seem to run as well or is less willing to "spin the tires" This is what is called "heat soak."

Technical: There are two puller fans each pulling 709 CFM. That 1
column12:
418 CFM of air flow across the core of the heat exchanger which pulls the heat out of the fluid in the intercooler and heat exchanger.

Installation: Click here for help on installing this product.
column15:
designed and manufactured in the U.S.A.

82@^http://www.shelbystore.com/product-p/S7MR-6675-C.htm^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/Shelby-GT500-Aluminum-7-Quart-Race-Baffled-Oil-Pan-p/s7mr-6675-c.htm^@^Shelby Aluminum 7 Quart Race Baffled Oil Pan (2007-2012)^@^Engine Parts^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/S7MR-6675-C-2.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/S7MR-6675-C-2.jpg^@^Shelby Aluminum 7 Quart Race Baffled Oil Pan (2007-2012)^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/S7MR-6675-C-2S.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/S7MR-6675-C-2S.jpg^@^S7MR-6675-C^@619.99@$619.99@^ Applications:
  • Shelby GT500 (2007-2012)
When on the track or attacking the curves of your favorite twisty road
column2: the oil in your stock oil pan can slosh around and possibly leave the pickup tube allowing for air to enter the oiling system. This aluminum
column3: race baffled oil pan from Shelby American will help prevent that from happening. Our oil pan has four trap doors allowing oil to move toward the pickup tube
column4:
but closes during hard corning and braking to keep the tube submerged in oil the entire time. The pan was designed to fit on the 5.4L GT500 engine without clearance issues and has a capacity of 7 quarts of oil.

Notes: Installation of this oil pan requires dropping the k-member which should be performed by a qualified technician.

Installation Instructions (PDF Adobe Acrobat File)^

With the ever increasing demand for power
column2: Whipple now offers the highest quality and highest flowing fly-by-wire mono-blade throttle body available today. Performance gains of nearly 100hp can be achieved on the Shelby GT500 (varies with boost and pulley size) as the stock unit is far too small. The Shelby GT500 unit can flow nearly 1900cfm yet it still use the same hose ID size for easy fitment. Factory electric motors and TPS sensors bolt directly to unit for simple adaptation. This throttle body is not intended as a direct bolt on
column3: it requires special tuning and may require machining. Shelby does not offer custom tuning for this unit
column4:
consult your tuner.

  • High precision brass gears
  • 50 to 100hp increases depending on boost levels
  • Fits with factory electric motor
  • Lightened gears for smooth operation
  • Available in black

column3: not extruded rail stock and feature an 11/16" internal diameter passage for maximum fuel delivery. The rails include the provision to mount the factory fuel pressure sensor

120@^http://www.shelbystore.com/product-p/Z15-M-4209ADPT-AC.htm^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/product-p/Z15-M-4209ADPT-AC.htm^@^Speed-Dial Speedometer Adjuster (2005-2010)^@^Engine Parts^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/Z15-M-4209ADPT-AC-2.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/Z15-M-4209ADPT-AC-2.jpg^@^Speed-Dial Speedometer Adjuster (2005-2010)^@@@^Z15-M-4209ADPT-AC^@196@$196.00@^ Applications:
  • Shelby - All Models (2007-2010) (Raptor & Focus Excluded)
  • Ford Mustang - All Models (2005-2010)

  • Used to correct speedometer because of tire size or gear ratio changes
  • Fits 1994-2004 Mustang manual and automatic transmission
  • Fits 2005-2010 Mustang with manual transmission. Will correct speedometer. It has no limit on magnitude of gear ratio change for manual transmission vehicles.
  • Fits 2005-2010 Mustang automatic transmission. Will correct speedometer to equivalent of 10% gear ratio change
column2:
higher or lower.

NOTE: To maintain cruise control function on 2005-2010 Mustang automatic and manual transmissions
column3: gear change is limited to equivalent of 5% higher or lower ratio (<+/-5% change). For example
column4:
a gear change from 3.55 to 3.73 results in a gear ratio reduction of 4.8% so cruise control will continue to operate normally. A gear ratio change from 3.55 to 4.11 results in a gear ratio reduction of 13.6% so cruise control operation is lost.

  • The Speed-Dial scales a frequency based vehicle speed signal up/down to maintain accurate vehicle speed indication to the instrument cluster and PCM.
  • Easy 4 wire installation
  • No reprogramming of PCM necessary

^

column1:
127@^http://www.shelbystore.com/product-p/OS1-.htm^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/Shelby-Oil-Separator-p/os1-.htm^@^Shelby Oil Separator (2005-2014)^@^Engine Parts^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/OS1--2.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/OS1--2.jpg^@^Shelby Oil Separator (2005-2014)^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/OS1--2S.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/OS1--2S.jpg^@^OS1-^@109.99@$109.99@^ Applications:
  • Shelby Mustang (2005-2014)
  • Ford Mustang (2005-2014)
Notes: GT500 passenger side uses the 180 degree version Hose Kits are required.

A car's PCV (Positive Crankcase Ventilation) system relieves crankcase pressure by venting it - back in the old days
column2: a simple breather tube atop the valve covers let those vapors out into the ozone layer. In the modern era
column3: these gases (which contain vaporized oil molecules) are fed back into the engine at the intake
column4: to be burned off. Unfortunately
column5: lots of those oil molecules return to liquid state in the intake manifold
column6: resulting in an engine that's essentially breathing oil
column7: and creating oil deposits in the manifold
column8: etc. An oil separator can liquify the oil before it reaches the intake
column9: and catches it in a removable receptacle that can be periodically emptied in normal maintenance. Extensive computer-modeled flow testing
column10: dyno testing
column11:
and over 1500 miles of real-world road-testing were used to ensure the Shelby Oil Separator is a consistent performer - catching the maximum amount of oil without impeding flow. All fittings are metal for secure mounting and durability. No plastic threads to strip or break!
Our new oil separator was designed to be functional
column13: and attractive
column14: while being versatile enough to adapt to many applications. It is available in Clear (Silver) or Black anodized finish
column15: with either the "CS" or "GT500" logo laser-etched on top
column16:
and in either a 180 degree (inline) or 90 degree (turn the corner) version. These configurations make it easy to select the proper layout on driver's-side OR passenger-side applications for many different cars
We've illustrated several pictures of the items and accessory install kit together
column17: keep in mind each separator is priced with only the 2 black metal fittings and two hose clamps included. These separators can be purchased that way and spliced into existing PCV lines
column18: or used with either the "GT500 Passenger Side OEM" hose kit (so you don't have to cut your factory hose)
column19: or our new optional Universal Mounting Kit
column20: which includes two 12" lengths of hose
column22:
and a mounting bracket (seen installed in a few of the Item pictures) that can be attached to a horizontal or vertical surface. The Universal Kit ensures compatibility with a wide variety of cars and configurations. Other "OEM hose kits" will be offered ASAP.

Installation Instructions (PDF Adobe Acrobat File)

Universal hose kit can be found here http://www.shelbystore.com/Universal-Install-Kit-For-Oil-Separators-p/ou1-kitu.htm

Driver side hose kit can be found here http://www.shelbystore.com/GT500-Driver-Side-Hose-Kit-For-Oil-Separators-p/os1-kitds.htm

Passenger side hose kit can be found here http://www.shelbystore.com/GT500-Passenger-Side-Hose-Kit-For-Oil-Separators-p/os1-kitps.htm

^

The unique display allows the user to follow the entire 8-step charging process. It is splash and dust proof

Designed to go with the graphics on the GT500 this cover has the iconic twin Le Mans stripes and the GT500 side stripes engraved into the aluminum. The cover is CNC-machined from a sold block of 1" thick 6061 aluminum and mates perfectly to the lip on the top of the stock cover. Installation is a snap and takes only a few minutes with the 3M adhesive tape already pre-installed.^

132@^http://www.shelbystore.com/product-p/MTP0001.htm^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/product-p/MTP0001.htm^@^Shelby 4.6L Tensioner Support Plate (2005-2010)^@^Engine Parts^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/MTP0001-2.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/MTP0001-2.jpg^@^Shelby 4.6L Tensioner Support Plate (2005-2010)^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/MTP0001-2S.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/MTP0001-2S.jpg^@^MTP0001^@72.1@$72.10@^ Applications: 2005-2010 Shelby GT and Mustang GT 4.6L engines.
  • Shelby GT 4.6L (2005-2010)
  • Ford Mustang GT 4.6L (2005-2010)
Notes: The kit is a complete bolt-on
column2: and requires no cutting
column3: drilling
column4: or any irreversible changes for installation. The kit includes the precision-machined billet plate with the Delrin insert
column5: three aluminum spacers
column6:
and three Grade 8 cap screws with washers.

Engraved with the famous Shelby Racing Logo
column7: this billet aluminum plate was designed by Metco as a solution to the problem of the factory Ford belt tensioner deflecting under load in supercharged applications. The factory tensioner arm tends to flex toward the front of the vehicle under heavy belt loads
column8: allowing the belt to slip. Adding boost with custom pulleys or adding an aftermarket supercharger to your vehicle loads the belt further
column9: compounding the flex problem. This brace is CNC-machined from 6061-T6 aluminum and is then finish-anodized in black for long-lasting surface protection. The brace simply bolts over the factory tensioner using the provided longer bolts
column10: and when installed
column11: prevents the tensioner from bending outward. A special Delrin insert is installed in the back of the brace to prevent metal-to-metal contact when the tensioner is heavily-loaded.^

This cat-back exhaust system bolts to the factory exhaust system after the catalytic converter and runs the whole way out the back of the car. Borla uses full 2-1/2" stainless steel mandrel-bent tubing that fits perfectly under the ST. Dual 4-1/2" round
column2:
rolled angle-cut tips exit the center of the rear bumper and Borla's name is embedded on the top of each tip for the ultimate look. The Touring style muffler sits at the back of the car and is hidden by the rear bumper.

Borla's 2-1/2" stainless steel Touring cat-back exhaust system looks as good as it sounds. Constructed from high-quality components for durability and strength
column3:

This rust retards further corrosion.

183@^http://www.shelbystore.com/product-p/Z32-93P902.htm^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/After-Cat-H-Pipe-for-Boss-302-p/z32-93p902.htm^@^After-Cat H-Pipe for Boss 302 (2012-2013)^@^Exhaust^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/Z32-93P902-2.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/Z32-93P902-2.jpg^@^After-Cat H-Pipe for Boss 302 (2012-2013)^@@@^Z32-93P902^@574.99@$574.99@^ Applications:
  • Ford Boss 302 (2012-2013)
For the driver seeking exhaust performance gains and deep muscle car sound
column2: customization and calibration doesn't end under the hood. A carefully selected mid-pipe upgrade enhances both driving power and exhaust sound. With the MRT After-Cat Series H-Pipe_x0099_
column3: quality performance sound that is aggressive but refined can be achieved even on a budget. MRT Performance has engineered the MRT After-Cat Series H-Pipe_x0099_ for 2012-2013 Boss 302. The MRT After-Cat H-Pipe_x0099_ reuses your Mustang's factory catalyst
column4: meaning a two important facts result: _x0095_ No tune is necessary to calibrate your car with this MRT H-Pipe _x0095_ You are assured that no conflicts with emissions standards will result from this mod The MRT After-Cat H-Pipe_x0099_ minimizes restriction and power losses by maximizing the flow of exhaust gases for performance driving. Our team of engineers optimized three key elements during the design process: _x0095_ tube diameter _x0095_ Smoothness of the exhaust path _x0095_ High Flow H-Pipe design From the factory
column5: 2011-2013 Mustangs are equipped with a mid-pipe that's 2.25 inches in diameter at the point of restriction. The MRT After-Cat H-Pipe_x0099_ widens the mid-pipe to 3 inches in diameter. MRT's CNC mandrel bending technology ensures that our After-Cat H-Pipe_x0099_ features smooth bends and precise fit. When your Mustang "breathes easier
column6: " you benefit from more usable power. MRT manufactures After-Cat H-Pipes_x0099_ out of the highest grade 304 Stainless Steel that's extremely durable against rust and corrosion resistant. All MRT exhaust systems are engineered and produced by MRT Performance. We inject that raw
column7: rugged performance spirit into the DNA of every exhaust we make. We make sure our After-Cat H-Pipe_x0099_ gives your Mustang a legendary
column8:
nostalgic muscle-car sound. You can expect the deepest rumble on the market with an MRT H-Pipe in comparison to X-Pipe designs. Why? The "H" shape maximizes total mid-pipe volume by avoiding an intersection of exhaust gases. It's that extra volume that gets you that deep exhaust note compared to the high pitched X-Pipe.

Features: _x0095_ Highest grade 304 stainless steel _x0095_ CNC mandrel bent _x0095_ Deep Muscle Car sound _x0095_ Improves flow of exhaust gases _x0095_ Easy
column9: direct bolt on installation _x0095_ Reuses factory catalyst
column10:
meaning no tuning is required _x0095_ Increased horsepower over comparative X-Pipe designs _x0095_ Increased torque over comparative X-Pipe designs _x0095_ Increased fuel economy over comparative X-Pipe designs

column11:
fast and smooth shifting of gears for street and racing applications.

Check out these features and compare us to the competition! _x0095_ Unique eccentric adjustable shift stops allow fine tuning without over stressing the transmission. _x0095_ High durometer polyurethane bushings for the front and rear mounts prevent unwanted deflection and stabilize hard shifts. Also includes stiffer lever bushings. _x0095_ Roller bearing pivot integrated with bronze brushings eliminates friction for an optimum precision feel. _x0095_ One piece solid 6061-T6 billet aluminum frame and support arm housing
column12: anodized for corrosion protection _x0095_ Spring tension prevents mis-shifts by forcing you into 3rd gear _x0095_ High durometer lever bushings to replace the factory soft rubber and tighten up shifting _x0095_ Unique adjustable cam shift stops provide a positive stop to prevent over travel in the linkage that causes damage to the transmission under hard usage _x0095_ Revised pivot ratio for shorter
column13:
faster throws and quicker shifts _x0095_ High durometer polyurethane front and rear mount bushings to isolate noise and vibration for precision feel and comfort _x0095_ High alloy heat treated and nickel plated pivot lever gives the ultimate in strength and durability which pivots in a custom injected delrin pivot cup. Unlike the competition this prevents wear in the area that sees the most contact and further reduces stick vibration and noise _x0095_ Roller bearing lower shaft pivot bushing _x0095_ Designed with 2 transmission support bars as the factory intended

When the 2005 Mustang came out
column2: it had a vast improvement in chassis rigidity over the outgoing model
column3: however it is still a uni-body and we are still left with a front and rear subframe that is not connected. These subframe connectors take over where the factory left off by tying the rear control arm mounts and subframe assembly to the front subframe. The HD boxed subframes go a few steps further than the tubular design by triangulating key structural points together to make a very rigid frame. When it came time for Shelby to build the Shelby 1000
column4: the need for a more rigid structure was further highlighted. Thus
column5:
these connectors are Shelby factory OEM with every Shelby 1000. Will fit convertibles if rear bracing is removed. When installing these sub-frame connectors it is highly recommended to purchase the K-member Support Brackets found here as well to make the chassis as rigid as possible.

252@^http://www.shelbystore.com/product-p/z25-s11ma-3074-mnt.htm^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/product-p/z25-s11ma-3074-mnt.htm^@^Shelby Rear Upper Control Arm Mount (2005-2010)^@^Suspension^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/z25-s11ma-3074-mnt-2.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/z25-s11ma-3074-mnt-2.jpg^@^Shelby Rear Upper Control Arm Mount (2005-2010)^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/z25-s11ma-3074-mnt-2S.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/z25-s11ma-3074-mnt-2S.jpg^@^Z25-S11MA-3074-MNT^@149.95@$149.95@^ Applications:
  • Shelby GT500 (2007-2010)
  • Ford Mustang - All Models (2005-2010)
Our upper control arm mount is a direct replacement for the OE piece and requires no drilling or welding to install. The last generation Fox body Mustangs had upper control arm mounts incorporated into the frame. They also had two upper control arms sharing the load but drag racers were continually ripping the mounts off of the frame when racing. The solution for those cars was to weld reinforcement plates onto the frame. This new Mustang platform only has one upper control arm and the mount is bolted into place. Our upper mount is made from heavy duty 1/4" plate and can be either bolted or welded into place. Additionally it has dual control arm mounting points for changing instant center.

Color: Hammertone Powdercoated or Red Powdercoated.^

253@^http://www.shelbystore.com/product-p/z25-s11ma-3075-mnt.htm^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/product-p/z25-s11ma-3075-mnt.htm^@^Shelby Rear Upper Control Arm Mount (2011-2014)^@^Suspension^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/z25-s11ma-3075-mnt-2.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/z25-s11ma-3075-mnt-2.jpg^@^Shelby Rear Upper Control Arm Mount (2011-2014)^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/z25-s11ma-3075-mnt-2S.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/z25-s11ma-3075-mnt-2S.jpg^@^Z25-S11MA-3075-MNT^@149.95@$149.95@^ Applications:

  • Ford Mustang - All Models (2011-2014)
  • Ford boss 302 (2012-2013)
Notes: This specific part number is intended for 2011 and newer cars that utilize the larger 18mm mounting bolt and cross-bolt.

Our upper control arm mount is a direct replacement for the OE piece and requires no drilling or welding to install. The last generation Fox body Mustangs had upper control arm mounts incorporated into the frame. They also had two upper control arms sharing the load but drag racers were continually ripping the mounts off of the frame when racing. The solution for those cars was to weld reinforcement plates onto the frame. This new Mustang platform only has one upper control arm and the mount is bolted into place. Our upper mount is made from heavy duty 1/4" plate and can be either bolted or welded into place. Additionally it has dual control arm mounting points for changing instant center.

Color: Hammertone Powdercoated or Red Powdercoated.

Installation Instructions (PDF Adobe Acrobat File)^

When you're serious about minimizing rear axle wheel hop
column2:
Shelby has rear control arm relocation brackets to help. Our rear relocation brackets allow you to alter the vehicle's instant center by varying the control arm angles. Remember that a vehicle's instant center determines the ability to transfer weight properly upon acceleration.

This modification is beneficial for road racing applications as well as vehicles that have been lowered. These brackets bolt in with provided hardware
column3: however
column4:
we recommend that they be welded into place for drag racing applications.

column2:
found here.
Availability: Usually Ships in 1 to 2 Weeks

What a Panhard bar does: The purpose of the Panhard bar is to prevent lateral movement (side to side or backward and forward) of the rear axle. In essence
column3:
it was designed to allow for movement in a vertical plane.

How does Shelby improve on this? Factory original Panhard bars are made from small diameter tubing with rubber bushings
column4: which allow for deflection under load. This problem frequently occurs in Shelby Mustangs. Shelby American's adjustable Panhard rod is made from 1.25" DOM tubing (drawn over mandrel tubing) and finished with high performance polyurethane bushings. Our bar features left and right hand threads so that it can be adjusted while on your Ford or Shelby Mustang. The adjusters themselves are made from super strong 4130 chromoly and are complemented by 304 stainless end spacers. If you want the ultimate in performance handling characteristics
column5:
Shelby's Panhard bars are an excellent addition. They are especially important for lowered or vehicles with wider than factory wheels/tires.

Color: Hammertone Powdercoated or Red Powdercoated.

Shelby American Always insist on genuine Shelby American products for your Shelby Mustang. Made in the U.S.A.

Installation Instructions (PDF Adobe Acrobat File)

column6: one-piece forged wheels from Shelby American. Made exclusively by Weld Racing for Shelby American
column7: these wheels are some of the strongest
column8: lightest 20" offerings ever to be available for the '05-15 Mustang. Offered in two sizes and three finishes
column9:
the staggered fitment allows you to maximize the amount of rubber you can fit under your Mustang and Shelby for optimal performance. Wheels are treated with a proprietary crystal-clear ATC Nano-ceramic barrier for a long lasting shine. Suggested tire sizes are a massive 305/30ZR20 for the rear 20"x10.5" and 275/35ZR20 for the front 20"x9.5" to achieve that perfect profile.

NOTE: Lowered 2005-14 vehicles require an adjustable pan-hard bar or watts link
column10:
available separately from Shelby Performance Parts.

283@@^http://www.shelbystore.com/2012-2013-Boss-302-Alternator-p/m-8600-m50balt.htm^@^Boss 302 Alternator Kit (2011-2013)^@^Electrical^@^http://www.shelbystore.com/v/vspfiles/photos/M-8600-M50BALT-2.jpg^@^/v/vspfiles/photos/M-8600-M50BALT-2.jpg^@^Boss 302 Alternator Kit (2011-2013)^@@@^M-8600-M50BALT^@310@$310.00@^Applications:

The 2012-2013 Boss 302 Mustang uses a special high performance alternator
column2:
which was designed to operate at higher RPMs. This high performance alternator uses a larger pulley to slow the armature speed in order to reduce drag and parasitic horsepower loss. It also uses a 1-way clutch to prevent belt hop-off during upshifts.
